mapper.select: select attributename_id, attributename_name, attributename_type, attributename_1, attributename_2, attributename_3 from wph.wph_attributename where attributename_id = #{attributenameId}
select attributename_id, attributename_name, attributename_type, attributename_1, attributename_2, attributename_3 from wph.wph_attributename limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into wph.wph_attributename(attributename_name, attributename_type, attributename_1, attributename_2, attributename_3) values (#{attributenameName}, #{attributenameType}, #{attributename_1}, #{attributename_2}, #{attributename_3})
mapper.update:
update wph.wph_attributename
attributename_name = #{attributenameName},
attributename_type = #{attributenameType},
attributename_1 = #{attributename_1},
attributename_2 = #{attributename_2},
attributename_3 = #{attributename_3},
where attributename_id = #{attributenameId}
